sentences.sContent: Can I have some bread and butter?
sentences.sContent_eng: Can I have some bread and butter?
sentences.sCn: 能给我一些面包和黄油吗?。

sentences.sContent: We never use cheese, butter or something like that to cook it.
sentences.sContent_eng: We never use cheese, butter or something like that to cook it.
sentences.sCn: 我们从未使用乳酪，黄油或者类如此物来烹调食品。

溶化牛油；溶化奶油；黄油溶液
对…说好话；恭维，阿谀奉承
n. 奶油夹心饼；加糖奶豆浆

words.tran: 谄媚的，奉承的；涂用黄油的；像黄油样的

trans.tranOther: a solid yellow food made from milk or cream that you spread on bread or use in cooking
